subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Michael Rogers took advantage of a downhill attack to win the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and a fellow Australian, Cadel Evans, retained the overall lead.
snippet: Michael Rogers took advantage of a downhill attack to win the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and a fellow Australian, Cadel Evans, retained the overall lead.
